fields.label: Business Information
fields.description: Fields to be entered manually in Frappe

fields.label: Customer Code
fields.description: Manual entry field - Maps to SAIBA Customer Code (Bigint)

fields.label: PolicyBiz Type
fields.description: Manual entry field - Maps to SAIBA PolicyBiz Type (Varchar(10))

fields.label: Insurer Branch Code
fields.description: Manual entry field - Maps to SAIBA Insurer Branch Code (Numeric(18,0))

fields.label: New/Renewal
fields.description: Manual entry field - Maps to SAIBA NewRenewal (Varchar(10))

fields.label: Payment Mode
fields.description: Manual entry field - Maps to SAIBA Payment Mode (Varchar(Max))

fields.label: Bank Name
fields.description: Manual entry field - Maps to SAIBA Bank Name (Varchar(75))

fields.label: Payment Transaction No
fields.description: Manual entry field - Maps to SAIBA Payment TransactionNo (Varchar(50))

fields.label: Policy Information
fields.description: Fields extracted from policy copy via OCR

fields.label: Policy No
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA PolicyNo (Varchar(100))

fields.label: Policy Type
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA Policy Type (Varchar(75))

fields.label: Policy Issuance Date
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA PolicyIssuanceDate (Datetime)

fields.label: Policy Start Date
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA PolicyStartDate (Datetime)

fields.label: Policy Expiry Date
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA PolicyExpiryDate (Datetime)

fields.label: Sum Insured
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA Sum Insured (Numeric(22,2))

fields.label: Net/OD Premium
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA Net/OD Premium (Numeric(18,2))

fields.label: TP Premium
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA TP Premium (Numeric(22,2))

fields.label: GST
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA GST (Numeric(22,2))

fields.label: NCB
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA NCB (Numeric(18,2))

fields.label: Vehicle Information
fields.description: Vehicle details extracted from policy copy via OCR

fields.label: Vehicle No
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA VehicleNo (Varchar(50))

fields.label: Make
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA Make (Varchar(50))

fields.label: Model
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA Model (Varchar(50))

fields.label: Variant
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA Variant (Varchar(150))

fields.label: Year of Manufacture
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA YearofMan (Bigint)

fields.label: Chasis No
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA ChasisNo (Varchar(50))

fields.label: Engine No
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA EngineNo (Varchar(50))

fields.label: CC
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA CC (Varchar(50))

fields.label: Fuel
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA Fuel (Varchar(50))

fields.label: RTO Code
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA RTO Code (Varchar(50))

fields.label: Vehicle Category
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA VehicleCategory (Varchar(50))

fields.label: Passenger GVW
fields.description: OCR extracted - Maps to SAIBA PassengerGVW (Varchar(50))
